actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution relating to the censure of Robert Bork for removing Archibald Cox as Special Prosecutor.

summary.text: Declares that the Senate hereby finds the action of Robert Bork in removing Mr. Archibald Cox is a breach of the assurances made by Elliot Richardson on behalf of the President of the United States to the United States Senate. Declares that the Senate hereby condemns Robert Bork for removing Archibald Cox as Special Prosecutor in derogation of the solemn assurances made to the United States Senate

titles.title: A resolution relating to the censure of Robert Bork for removing Archibald Cox as Special Prosecutor.
